alert.note: Alert for Harris; Muscogee (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 2:24PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Muscogee and southwestern Harris Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 223 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Fortson, or 7 miles northeast of Columbus. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...40 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Bibb City, Goat Rock Lake, Edgewood, Flat Rock, Highland Park, Laurel Hills, Green Island Hills, Cataula, Columbus Metropolitan Airport, Rose Hill, Kenwood, Midland, Mountain Hill, Fortson, Mulberry Grove, and Lake Harding. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
